book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲁⲩⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲁⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ.
English: the blessing of all men, and the covenant, (23) And made it rest upon the head of Jacob.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ.
English: He acknowledged him in his blessing, and gave him an heritage,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲱϣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲡⲟϣⲟⲩ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲛⲟⲟⲩⲥ ⲙ̅ⲫⲩⲗⲏ.
English: and divided his portions; among the twelve tribes did he part them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁ ⲁϥϭⲛ̅ϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲃⲁⲗ ⲛⲓⲙ ϩⲓ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: And he brought out of him a merciful man, which found favour in the sight of all flesh,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲁⲩⲙⲉⲣⲓⲧϥ̅ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲙⲱⲩ̈ⲥⲏⲥ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲣ̅ⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ.
English: even Moses, beloved of God and men, whose memorial is blessed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛϥ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ..... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲁⲥⲧϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ .....
English: He made him like to the glorious saints, and magnified him, so that his enemies stood in fear of him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁϥϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ.
English: By his words he caused the wonders to cease, and he made him glorious in the sight of kings,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϩⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲟϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: and gave him a commandment for his people, and shewed him part of his glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲡⲓⲥⲧⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲁϣ ⲁϥⲥⲟⲧⲡϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: He sanctified him in his faithfulness and meekness, and chose him out of all men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲣⲉϥⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲥⲙⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲓⲧϥ̅ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲡⲟⲥϭⲙ̅.
English: He made him to hear his voice, and brought him into the dark cloud,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ
English: and gave him commandments before his face, even the law of life and knowledge,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲓⲁⲕⲱⲃ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲉⲛⲉϥϩⲁⲡ.
English: that he might teach Jacob his covenants, and Israel his judgments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲟⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲉϯⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲗⲉⲩⲉⲓ.
English: He exalted Aaron, an holy man like unto him, even his brother, of the tribe of Levi.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: An everlasting covenant he made with him and gave him the priesthood among the people;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲙⲁⲕⲁⲣⲓⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲧⲥⲁⲛⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲙⲟⲣϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: he beautified him with comely ornaments, and clothed him with a robe of glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ϩⲓⲱⲱϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲩⲛⲧⲉⲗⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁϫⲣⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲥⲕⲉⲩⲏ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ
English: He put upon him perfect glory; and strengthened him with rich garments,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲡⲉⲣⲓⲥⲕⲉⲗⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲇⲏⲣⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲱⲙⲓⲥ ..... ϩⲉⲛϩⲣⲟⲓ̈ⲥⲕⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ϣϭⲗ̅ϭⲓⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ
English: with breeches, with a long robe, and the ephod. (9) And he compassed him with pomegranates, and with many golden bells round about,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩϯ ϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲧⲁϭⲥⲉ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲩϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲣⲡⲉ ⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ:
English: that as he went there might be a sound, and a noise made that might be heard in the temple, for a memorial to the children of his people;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲉⲥⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ϩⲓ ϩⲩⲁⲕⲓⲛⲑⲓⲛⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲏϭⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲓⲕⲓⲗⲧⲏⲥ:
English: With an holy garment, with gold, and blue silk, and purple, the work of the embroiderer,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲟⲅⲓⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ⲕⲣⲓⲥⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲕⲕⲟⲥ ⲉϥϩⲟⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲭⲛⲓⲧⲏⲥ
English: with a breastplate of judgment, and with Urim and Thummim; (11) With twisted scarlet, the work of the cunning workman,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲉⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟϣⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲕⲉϩⲕ̅ ⲱⲛⲉ
English: with precious stones graven like seals, and set in gold, the work of the jeweller,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲥϣⲉⲧϣⲱⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ:
English: with a writing engraved for a memorial, after the number of the tribes of Israel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ϩⲓ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧϭⲓⲇⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲟⲩⲧⲩⲡⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ
English: He set a crown of gold upon the mitre, wherein was engraved Holiness,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ ⲉⲩⲧⲥⲁⲛⲏⲩ.
English: an ornament of honour, a costly work, the desires of the eyes, goodly and beautiful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥϩⲉ ϩⲁ ⲧⲉϥϩⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϣⲙ̅ⲙⲟ ⲛⲁϯ ϩⲓⲱⲱϥ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ϣⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ......
English: Before him there were none such, neither did ever any stranger put them on, but only his children and his children’s children perpetually.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲧⲁⲗⲉ ⲧⲉⲩⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲏⲏⲛⲉ ϣⲁⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Their sacrifices shall be wholly consumed every day twice continually.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲙⲱⲩ̈ⲥⲏⲥ ⲙⲉϩ ⲛⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲁϥⲧⲱϩⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲉϩ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ.
English: Moses consecrated him, and anointed him with holy oil:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲉⲩⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲉ
English: this was appointed unto him by an everlasting covenant, and to his seed, so long as the heavens should remain,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ.
English: that they should minister unto him, and execute the office of the priesthood, and bless the people in his name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲱⲧⲡ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲣⲉϥⲧⲁⲗⲟ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲩϣⲟⲩϩⲏⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϯⲛⲟⲩϥⲉ ⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: He chose him out of all men living to offer sacrifices to the Lord, incense, and a sweet savour, for a memorial, to make reconciliation for his people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲁⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲝⲟⲩⲥⲓⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲡ
English: He gave unto him his commandments, and authority in the statutes of judgments,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ ⲉⲛⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲙⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ:
English: that he should teach Jacob the testimonies, and inform Israel in his laws.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲙⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲕⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϩⲓ ⲡϫⲁⲉⲓ̈ⲉ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲑⲁⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲁⲃⲓⲣⲱⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲥⲩⲛⲁⲅⲱⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ.
English: Strangers conspired together against him, and maligned him in the wilderness, even the men that were of Dathan’s and Abiron’s side, and the congregation of Core, with fury and wrath.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲁϥϥⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲟⲣⲅⲏ.
English: This the Lord saw, and it displeased him, and in his wrathful indignation were they consumed:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .....ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ......... ⲙ̅ⲡⲱⲕϩⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϩ.
English: he did wonders upon them, to consume them with the fiery flame.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲟⲩⲉϩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲁⲡⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲣ̅ⲡ ⲛ̅ϭⲣⲱϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲱϣ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ ⲉⲩⲥⲉⲓ.
English: But he made Aaron more honourable, and gave him an heritage, and divided unto him the firstfruits of the increase; especially he prepared bread in abundance:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲁⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ.
English: For they eat of the sacrifices of the Lord, which he gave unto him and his seed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲗⲏⲛ ϥⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲁⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ ⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ.
English: Howbeit in the land of the people he had no inheritance, neither had he any portion among the people: for the Lord himself is his portion and inheritance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲫⲓⲛⲉⲉⲥ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲗⲉⲁⲍⲁⲣ ⲡⲙⲉϩϣⲟⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥⲕⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: The third in glory is Phinees the son of Eleazar, because he had zeal in the fear of the Lord,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲁϩⲉ ⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲣⲟⲧ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ.
English: and stood up with good courage of heart: when the people were turned back, and made reconciliation for Israel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲉⲁϩⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ
English: Therefore was there a covenant of peace made with him, that he should be the chief of the sanctuary and of his people,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲉⲥⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: and that he and his posterity should have the dignity of the priesthood for ever:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲇⲁⲩⲓⲇ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲓⲟⲩⲇⲁ ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧ ⲧⲉⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ.
English: According to the covenant made with David son of Jesse, of the tribe of Juda, that the inheritance of the king should be to his posterity alone: so the inheritance of Aaron should also be unto his seed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲉϯ ⲛ̅ⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥⲩⲛⲏ
English: God give you wisdom in your heart to judge his people in righteousness,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉⲩⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ϣⲁ ϩⲛ̅ϫⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲙ.
English: that their good things be not abolished, and that their glory may endure for ever.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲓ̈ⲏⲥⲟⲩⲥ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲩⲏ ⲡϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲟⲥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲣ̅ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲱⲩ̈ⲥⲏⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲓⲁ
English: Jesus the son a Nave was valiant in the wars, and was the successor of Moses in prophecies,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲥⲱⲧⲡ̅
English: who according to his name was made great for the saving of the elect of God,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϫⲓ ⲕⲃⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲧⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲉϯⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ
English: and taking vengeance of the enemies that rose up against them, that he might set Israel in their inheritance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϥⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϭⲓϫ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲏϥⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ.
English: How great glory gat he, when he did lift up his hands, and stretched out his sword against the cities!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲁ ⲧⲉϥϩⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲓ̈ϩⲉ; ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲉϯⲛⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϯ ⲟⲩⲃⲏϥ.
English: Who before him so stood to it? for the Lord himself brought his enemies unto him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲁⲛ ⲁ ⲡⲣⲏ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲁϩⲟⲩ .........ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲣ̅ⲥⲛⲁⲩ;
English: Did not the sun go back by his means? and was not one day as long as two?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲡⲓⲕⲁⲗⲉⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥⲑⲗⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲧⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲱⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲭⲁⲗⲁⲍⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ.
English: He called upon the most high Lord, when the enemies pressed upon him on every side; and the great Lord heard him. (6) And with hailstones of mighty power

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲩⲃⲏϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲉⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈
English: he made the battle to fall violently upon the nations, and in the descent of Beth-horon he destroyed them that resisted,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲩⲡⲁⲛϩⲟⲡⲗⲓⲁ ϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲁϩϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲟⲩϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ.
English: that the nations might know all their strength, because he fought in the sight of the Lord, and he followed the Mighty One.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲱⲩ̈ⲥⲏⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲭⲁⲗⲉⲃ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲉⲫⲟⲛⲏ:
English: In the time of Moses also he did a work of mercy, he and Caleb the son of Jephunne,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲁⲧⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲃⲏⲩ ⲉⲕⲱⲗⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ.
English: in that they withstood the congregation, and withheld the people from sin, and appeased the wicked murmuring.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲃⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲍⲟⲥ
English: And of six hundred thousand people on foot, they two were preserved

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϫⲓⲧⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲧⲉⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲉⲩⲕⲁϩ ⲉϥϣⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲣⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓ ⲉⲃⲓⲱ.
English: to bring them in to the heritage, even unto the land that floweth with milk and honey.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϯ ⲟⲩϭⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲭⲁⲗⲉⲃ ⲁⲥϭⲱ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ϣⲁ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ
English: The Lord gave strength also unto Caleb, which remained with him unto his old age:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲣⲉϥⲁⲗⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ
English: so that he entered upon the high places of the land, and his seed obtained it for an heritage:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲛⲁⲩ ϫⲉ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲁϩⲕ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: That all the children of Israel might see that it is good to follow the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲕⲣⲓⲧⲏⲥ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ⲡⲟⲩⲁ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲛⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲟⲣⲛⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲕⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ
English: And concerning the judges, every one by name, whose heart went not a whoring, nor departed from the Lord,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲩⲕⲁⲁⲥ ϯⲟⲩⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉϯ ⲡⲉⲩⲣⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ϣⲃⲉⲓⲱ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲉⲧⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲏⲩ.
English: let their memory be blessed. (12) Let their bones flourish out of their place, and let the name of them that were honoured be continued upon their children.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲥⲁⲙⲟⲩⲏⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲡⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲁϥⲕⲁⲑⲓⲥⲧⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣ̅ⲣⲟ
English: Samuel, the prophet of the Lord, beloved of his Lord, established a kingdom,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲱϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁϥⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲩⲛⲁⲅⲱⲅⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: and anointed princes over his people. (14) By the law of the Lord he judged the congregation,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϭⲛ̅ⲡϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ ⲁϥⲥⲟⲧⲡϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲣⲁⲥⲟⲩ ϫⲉ ϥⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ ⲛⲁϥ:
English: and the Lord had respect unto Jacob. (15) By his faithfulness he was found a true prophet, and by his word he was known to be faithful in vision.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲡⲓⲕⲁⲗⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ ⲑⲗⲓⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲓⲉⲓⲃ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁⲙ ⲉⲣⲱⲧⲉ.
English: He called upon the mighty Lord, when his enemies pressed upon him on every side, when he offered the sucking lamb.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϯϩⲣⲟⲩⲃⲃⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲣⲉⲩⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲥⲙⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ.
English: And the Lord thundered from heaven, and with a great noise made his voice to be heard.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲟⲩⲱϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲧⲩⲣⲁⲛⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲓⲥⲧⲉⲓⲙ.
English: And he destroyed the rulers of the Tyrians, and all the princes of the Philistines.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧϥ̅ⲕⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁϥⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲓ̈ⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ
English: And before his long sleep he made protestations in the sight of the Lord and his anointed,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓϫⲓⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲛ̅ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ϣⲁ ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲩⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲕⲁⲗⲓ ⲛⲁϥ.
English: I have not taken any man’s goods, so much as a shoe: and no man did accuse him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲉⲩⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲣⲉϥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁϥϫⲱ ⲉⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙⲟⲩ:
English: And after his death he prophesied, and shewed the king his end,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲥⲙⲏ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲓⲁ ⲉϥⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: and lifted up his voice from the earth in prophecy, to blot out the wickedness of the people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲁ ⲛⲁⲑⲁⲛ ⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲁϥⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲉⲩⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ.
English: And after him rose up Nathan to prophesy in the time of David.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧ ⲉⲁⲩⲡⲟⲣϫϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲱⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ.
English: As is the fat taken away from the peace offering, so was David chosen out of the children of Israel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲁⲥ ⲃ̅ⲃⲁⲁⲙⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲝ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲓⲉⲓⲃ .....
English: He played with lions as with kids, and with bears as with lambs.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲟⲩⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲅⲓⲅⲁⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ
English: Slew he not a giant, when he was yet but young? and did he not take away reproach from the people,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲫⲉⲛⲇⲟⲛⲏ ⲉⲧⲁⲟⲩⲟ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲅⲟⲗⲓⲁⲑ;
English: when he lifted up his hand with the stone in the sling, and beat down the boasting of Goliath?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲉⲡⲓⲕⲁⲗⲉⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲟⲙ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲟⲩⲛⲁⲙ
English: For he called upon the most high Lord; and he gave him strength in his right hand

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲁⲕⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲉⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲁⲡ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: to slay that mighty warrior, and set up the horn of his people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲧⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲓ̈ϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉⲩⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲣⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: So the people honoured him with ten thousands, and praised him in the blessings of the Lord, in that he gave him a crown of glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲟⲩⲱϣϥ̅ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲧⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲥⲉϣϥ̅ ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲓⲥⲧⲓⲉⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲃⲏϥ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲱⲥϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲁⲡ ϣⲁ ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲡⲟⲟⲩ.
English: For he destroyed the enemies on every side, and brought to nought the Philistines his adversaries, and brake their horn in sunder unto this day.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲝⲟⲙⲟⲗⲟⲅⲏⲥⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲁϥⲥⲙⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟϥ.
English: In all his works he praised the Holy One most high with words of glory; with his whole heart he sung songs, and loved him that made him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲯⲁⲗⲗⲉⲓ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ..... ⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲗⲗⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ.
English: He set singers also before the altar, that by their voices they might make sweet melody, and daily sing praises in their songs.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲕⲟⲥⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ϣⲁ ⲑⲁⲏ
English: He beautified their feasts, and set in order the solemn times until the end,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉⲩⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲱϣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϫⲓⲛ ϩⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ
English: that they might praise his holy name, and that the temple might sound from morning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲕⲁ ⲛⲉϥⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲧⲁⲡ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ:
English: The Lord took away his sins, and exalted his horn for ever:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲣⲱⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲑⲣⲟⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ.
English: he gave him a covenant of kings, and a throne of glory in Israel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲡⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲱϣⲥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: After him rose up a wise son, and for his sake he dwelt at large.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲥⲟⲗⲟⲙⲱⲛ ⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϯⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ϯⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ⲛⲁϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ
English: Solomon reigned in a peaceable time, and was honoured; for God made all quiet round about him,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ϩⲓ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲥⲟⲃⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: that he might build an house in his name, and prepare his sanctuary for ever.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲕⲣ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲉⲣⲟ.
English: How wise wast thou in thy youth and, as a flood, filled with understanding!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲡⲱⲣϣ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲁⲓⲛⲓⲅⲙⲁ.
English: Thy soul covered the whole earth, and thou filledst it with dark parables.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲡⲱϩ ϣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲥⲟⲥ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲏⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲙⲉⲣⲉ .........
English: Thy name went far unto the islands; and for thy peace thou wast beloved.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϩⲱⲇⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲡⲁⲣϩⲟⲓⲙⲓⲁ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ϩⲛ̅ⲭⲱⲣⲁ ⲣ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲃⲱⲗ.
English: The countries marvelled at thee for thy songs, and proverbs, and parables, and interpretations.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲣⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϫⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲁⲕⲥⲉⲩϩ ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲃⲁⲥⲛ̅ϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲫⲁⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲁϩⲧ̅.
English: By the name of the Lord God, which is called the Lord God of Israel, thou didst gather gold as tin and didst multiply silver as lead.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲕⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲕⲉϩⲧⲉ ⲉⲛⲉϩⲓⲟⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲣ̅ϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲥⲱⲙⲁ.
English: Thou didst bow thy loins unto women, and by thy body thou wast brought into subjection.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲕϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲱⲗⲙ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕϥⲱⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ
English: Thou didst stain thy honour, and pollute thy seed:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲙ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲑⲏⲧ
English: so that thou broughtest wrath upon thy children, and wast grieved for thy folly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲣⲟ ⲡⲱϣ ⲉⲁ ⲡⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲉⲫⲣⲁⲓⲙ ⲁⲣⲭⲓ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅.
English: So the kingdom was divided, and out of Ephraim ruled a rebellious kingdom.
